name: stick
example_en: He picked up a stick from the ground to draw in the sand.
example_cn: 他从地上捡起一根枝条在沙地上画画。
word_family: sticks(n) 棍子；手杖 ,sticking(v) 粘住；坚持 ,sticky(adj) 粘的；棘手的
memory_tips: 词源：来自古英语 'sticca'，意为小木棍。联想记忆：想象一根树枝（stick）像一根小木棍一样直立在沙地上。图像记忆：想象一个孩子用树枝在沙地上画画。

image_prompt.main_image: A detailed scene of a forest floor with various sizes of sticks scattered around, some partially buried in the soil, with sunlight filtering through the trees.
image_prompt.example_image: A child sitting on a sandy beach, using a stick to draw shapes and patterns in the sand, with the ocean in the background.

collocations: walking stick (手杖); stick figure (简笔画); stick together (团结一致)
